TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stroke extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 代表單一筆墨筆劃。

span.span: Represents a single ink stroke.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是指標的裝置，例如 tablet 畫筆或滑鼠從收集的資料物件。A is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse. 可用於建立及操作以程式設計的方式，以及可以表示以視覺化方式在具備筆墨功能的項目，例如。The can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the . A包含其位置和外觀的相關資訊。A contains information about both its position and appearance. 屬性是集合物件，指定的位置。The property is a collection of objects that specifies the position of the . 屬性會指定筆劃的外觀。The property specifies a stroke's appearance.

param.span: 如果要套用轉換至手寫筆筆尖，則為 ，否則為 。

summary.span: 根據指定的 物件執行轉換。

span.span: Performs a transformation based upon the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表 3x3 矩陣，用於二維空間中的轉換。The object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space. Stroke 物件的每個點所提供的矩陣轉換。Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix. 比方說如果原始 Point.X 值為 100，則原始 Point.Y 值是 55 和轉換 Matrix.Scale （0.5，0.5）、 新的 Point.X 值為 50，且新 Point.Y 值為 27.5。For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將轉換物件。The following example demonstrates how to transform a object. [!code-csharp[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/CSharp/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/VisualBasic/Module1.vb#1)]
